fields.description:
h2. Feature description
Customer is interested in using new Android Ice Cream Sandwich features available with Android 4.0
http://developer.android.com/design/index.html

This ticket relates to the introduction of Fixed Tabs.

h2. Additional notes
Customer ticket: http://support-admin.appcelerator.com/display/APP-427868
fields.summary: Android: add support for Fixed Tabs

comments.body: Action Bar feature is already covered by two other tickets.
